snippet.title: Free Demo on Steam | Shadow of the Depth
snippet.description:
Excited for the best season of the year with ChillyRoom's new demo on Steam! 

Our new dungeon crawler, Shadow of the Depth, is ready to knock your socks off. The game's free Steam demo introduces the main character Arthur & the first floor that ends with an epic boss fight.  Once you try it, you'll definitely want to put it on your Wishlist.

🔗Try it out on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2100150?utm_source=ytb&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=1208

🎮About Shadow of the Depth
Shadow of the Depth is a top-down action Roguelite game. Delve into a dungeon world of light and shadow to eradicate the monsters that ravage your home. Be prepared to step into the abyss before you!
